intro.p: The base class for all the validation attributes. This class define a property that is used to retrieve the validtor that is used to validate the value of the property.

section.title: AbstractValidationAttribute(IValidator validator)

section.p: Initializes a new instance of the Castle.ActiveRecord.AbstractValidationAttribute class.

tr.td: Gets the validator for this attribute. Each attribute that inherits from this class will have its own validtor.
